questionsPara.text: The Soins Karismä FAQ page will be the central hub in which you find the answers to the most asked questions we have received. If the answers listed below do not suffice, or your question is not present, we ask our clients to access the chat functionality at the bottom right or contact us via the contact page. We strive our best to answer the questions our clients have with accuracy and honesty.

shippingPara.text: Free shipping, Shipping conditions, Delivery delay, Shipping countries

returnPolicyPara.text: Return policy, exchange for salon products

orderPara.text: Order review, Cancel an order, Checkout and shopping cart problems

subsPlansPara.text: Subscriptions, Services, Expiration date, Payment confirmation, Locations, Purchase of subscription

academyPara.text: Requirements, Certifications, Request for refund, Course content, Registration for Soins Karismä salons

becomeSalonPara.text: Franchise model, Technology, Registration, Employees recommendation

careLineProductsPara.text: Packaging information, Tips and recommendations for products
